content: the text is a legal summary of a court case involving an inheritance the court ruled that the deceased persons son and daughter are the primary heirs and will each receive a 12 share of the inheritance the son will also receive cash in bank accounts a car and a cartoon barrel but he must pay 20000 eur within 8 days for a life maintenance contract and other items received the court determined the extent of the estate based on various documents and declared the children as the legal heirs after deducting funeral expenses the net value of the estate was negative so the court fees will be the responsibility of the parties involved the text also provides instructions for lodging an appeal including the deadline and requirements for the appeal

metadata.subject_of_succession: cash, transaction accounts, passenger vehicle, RP with a cartoon barrel
